    • addProbenComment

      public void addProbenComment​(Probe p, String c) throws ProbeNotFoundException, IllegalArgumentException, DuplicateKommentarException
      adds a comment to a sample
      Parameters:
      p - the sample
      c - the new comment
      Throws:
      ProbeNotFoundException - the sample could not be found in the database
      DuplicateKommentarException - if the comment already exists
      IllegalArgumentException

    • editProbenComment

      public void editProbenComment​(Probe p, Kommentar k, String c) throws ProbeNotFoundException, IllegalArgumentException, KommentarNotFoundException
      edits a comment of a sample
      Parameters:
      p - the sample
      c - the new comment text
      k - the Class of the Comment
      Throws:
      ProbeNotFoundException - the sample could not be found in the database
      KommentarNotFoundException - if the Comment could not be found
      IllegalArgumentException

    • deleteProbenComment

      public void deleteProbenComment​(Probe p, Kommentar k) throws ProbeNotFoundException, IllegalArgumentException, KommentarNotFoundException
      deletes a comment of a sample
      Parameters:
      p - the sample
      k - the comment to be deleted //TODO macht das sinn so?
      Throws:
      ProbeNotFoundException - the sample could not be found in the database
      KommentarNotFoundException - if the Comment could not be found
      IllegalArgumentException

      Returns:

    • setZustandForProbe

      public void setZustandForProbe​(Probe p, ProbenZustand z) throws ProbeNotFoundException, IllegalArgumentException
      sets the state of a sample
      Parameters:
      p - the sample
      z - the new state
      Throws:
      ProbeNotFoundException - sample not in database
      IllegalArgumentException - sample and/or state null

    • setZustandForProbe

      public void setZustandForProbe​(Probe p, int anzahl, ProbenZustand z) throws ProbeNotFoundException, IllegalArgumentException, DuplicateProbeException
      sets the state of a number of samples
      Parameters:
      p - the sample
      anzahl - number of samples, which should be changed
      z - the new state
      Throws:
      ProbeNotFoundException - sample not in database
      IllegalArgumentException - sample and/or state null
      DuplicateProbeException - sample allready exists in the db
